long_description: Developed specifically for tearing up hardpack trails, the superlight Inov8 Trailroc 226 Trail-Running Shoes feature 3 different outsole compounds to ensure ultimate grip. Mesh uppers with thermoplastic urethane overlays allow great breathability to keep your feet cool and dry. 5-finger polymer Meta-Shanks(TM) align with each individual metatarsal for great support while retaining impact protection and flexibility underfoot. Minimal cushioning underfoot gives the Trailroc 226 shoes a natural barefoot feel. Zero drop from heel to toe encourages a natural midfoot or forefoot strike to promote forward momentum and reduce the impact of heel striking. Outsoles blend softy sticky rubber, hard sticky rubber and endurance rubber for excellent traction. All-synthetic construction makes these vegan-friendly.
short_description: Developed specifically for tearing up hardpack trails, the superlight Inov8 Trailroc 226 Trail-Running Shoes feature 3 different outsole compounds to ensure ultimate grip.
